snippet: The Mitsubishi Regional Jet, the first commercial passenger aircraft built in Japan in five decades, is intended to compete with aircraft from Embraer and Bombardier.
abstract: Mitsubishi Regional Jet takes its maiden flight after three years of delays; jet, built by Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, is first commercial passenger aircraft made in Japan in 50 years and is symbol of country's ambition to have its aircraft industry compete with major global players.
lead_paragraph: The Mitsubishi Regional Jet, the first commercial passenger aircraft built in Japan in five decades, is intended to compete with aircraft from Embraer and Bombardier.

headline.main: Mitsubishi Unveils Jet, Japan’s First in 50 Years
headline.print_headline: Mitsubishi Unveils Jet, Japan’s First in 50 Years
